setExecutionStartTime

public void setExecutionStartTime()
Description copied from interface: ProcessContext
GrinderProcess calls ProcessContext.setExecutionStartTime() just before launching threads, after which it is never called again.

Specified by:
setExecutionStartTime in interface ProcessContext

getExecutionStartTime

public long getExecutionStartTime()
Description copied from interface: ProcessContext
GrinderProcess calls ProcessContext.setExecutionStartTime() just before launching threads, after which it is never called again.

Specified by:
getExecutionStartTime in interface ProcessContext
Returns:
Start of execution, in milliseconds since the Epoch.
